CMArticle.title: Chef Corp. Raises Revenue in Q2 2016

div.p: Chef Corp. today published results for its fiscal year 2015 third quarter which ended June 25, 2015. The Company achieved a record quarterly revenue of $81.2 million and a record quarterly net profit of $17.6 million. International sales accounted for 41 percent of the quarter’s revenue.

The largest gains in revenue came from the professional services department which advise restaurant owners in designing their kitchens and delivers outstanding quality to our customers' great appreciation.
“If the demand continues to rise like in the last several quarters that we've seen, we need to figure out where to build all these kitchens” said Brian Fraser, Chef Corp. CEO. “Globalization doesn't stop at appliances, so Chef Corp. is looking forward to fascinating opportunities for production and sales overseas.”

Since 1999, our more than 125,000 customers have come to know Chef Corp as their premier provider to find virtually anything needed for the restaurant supply industry. We are committed to delivering expert solutions with the personal attention you deserve.

Our services range from commercial kitchen supplies, including our special dedication to kitchen lighting; to our consumer offering, Perfect Chef, an omni-channel shop and customer magazine that delivers seasonal news, ideas, recipes, and handpicked products to inspire cooks and connoisseurs of the good life – in all of its forms.
